attributes.action: Start article 50 and leave Eu now the voices of UK have spoken and voted out
attributes.additional_details: Every one is forgetting about the UK citizens loving abroad and all our papers and government seem to care about are the foreign nationals in the country and forget about them. We if they get to stay here them out people should remain where they are but after that no more. More jobs for British people, more homes for British people, Margaret thatcher fuked it up to start with and now every tory does the same.
attributes.background: Waiting around will just pro long what the people want, it seems to only be London who is full of the foreign community that want to remain and change the referendum, unless article.50 it start now things will get worse, let's LEAVE NOW and not pro long it
